metadata.title: CVE-2021-45944 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Ghostscript GhostPDL 9.50 through 9.53.3 has a use-after-free insampled_data_sample (called from sampled_data_continue and interp).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45944` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.14+esm1
ghostscript-x - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.14+esm1
libgs9 - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.14+esm1
libgs9-common - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.14+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.14+esm1').
